# connect()

**Instance Method**

Connects to the publisher, allowing it to produce elements, and returns an instance with which to cancel publishing.

## Declaration

```swift
func connect() -> any Cancellable
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Cancellable] instance that you use to cancel publishing.
title: connect()
